## BasicPagingComponent class

Component used for rendering basic simple paging

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BasicPagingComponent extends PagingAbstractComponent<CssClassesBasicPaging, BasicPagingOptions> implements BasicPaging 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(pluginElement, changeDetector, gridPlugins, options)](./grid.basicpagingcomponent._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BasicPagingComponent</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_itemsPerPage](./grid.basicpagingcomponent._itemsperpage.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Number of items currently used for paging |
|  [\_page](./grid.basicpagingcomponent._page.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Index of currently selected page |
|  [\_paginator](./grid.basicpagingcomponent._paginator.md) |  | <code>Paginator</code> | Paginator used for getting page numbers |
|  [\_totalCount](./grid.basicpagingcomponent._totalcount.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Number of all items that are paged with current filter criteria |
|  [firstItemIndex](./grid.basicpagingcomponent.firstitemindex.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Zero based index of first displayed item on page |
